product_name: eGear Find-Me Floating Whistle/Mirror Combo - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The eGear Find-Me Floating Whistle/Mirror Combo brings together 2 essential survival items so you're prepared for the unexpected. High-visibility orange float minimizes the chance of losing the whistle and mirror in water. Lightweight whistle has a pea-less design that won't freeze, making it suitable for all-weather use; emits a shrill, high-pitched sound. Use the unbreakable acrylic mirror to reflect the sun to catch the eye of rescuers. The eGear Find-Me Floating Whistle/Mirror Combo includes a breakaway lanyard attachment. Closeout.
short_description: The eGear Find-Me Floating Whistle/Mirror Combo brings together 2 essential survival items so you're prepared for the unexpected.
